RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 73. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHUTUP AND HANG ON chased the pace three wide, made a four wide bid leaving the quarter pole, drew off in the final furlong to prove much the best under mild right handed crop urging. HAPPYBIRTHDAYCOREY vied for the lead on the inside and proved to be no match for the winner while clearly second best. RUNNIN REDBIRD was rated along the inside, angled out in the lane and was up for the show award. HAPPY TAPPY TIM pressed the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn to vie for command but came up empty in the drive, lost show late. RAIN LILLY vied for the early lead two wide, then was between rivals on the turn and weakened. MIZ THE BEST was settled early, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. UNCAPTURED GRACE failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Happybirthdaycorey
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Shutup and Hang On
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, bid 4 wide, drew off 1/8, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Runnin Redbird
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, angled out stretch, got show

ENTRY.NAME: Rain Lilly
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2 wide, between horses turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Miz the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Tappy Tim
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, empty stretch, lost show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKIMBLE SHANKS vied for the early lead three wide, then went on to set the pace on the backstretch and move down to the inside, dreew clear on the turn and then drew off leaving the turn and then was hand ridden to the wire to prove much the best. SALTY HEIR prompted the pace four wide and was five wide on the backstretch, chased the winner three wide on the turn, lugged in by the three sixteenths and was no match to the winner while clearly second best. BENCH PRESS was allowed to settle earrly, advanced four wide on the turn and was no threat to the top two while besting the rest. MR. REDOLFO vied for the early lead on the inside and tired. FLAT BUSTED vied for the early lead between rivals and stopped. OATIE broke outwardly, tracked the pace three to four wide and was between rivals at the six furlong marker and was through after a half mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Redolfo
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Busted
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable and Martin Kaci
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Skimble Shanks
ENTRY.OWNER: Rock Bottom Ranch and Warrior's Reward LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, pace backstretch, drew clear turn, drew off, handily

ENTRY.NAME: Salty Heir
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 4 wide, 5 wide 1/2, 3 wide turn, lugged in 3/16,2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bench Press
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide turn, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Oatie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, tracked between horses, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 16400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, a llowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIZ CHAPLIN set a pressured pace three wide, made a bid to draw clear on the turn and remained in the three path, then drew out in the final furlong under a hand ride. TOOTSYSROCKNROLLER was rated early on the inside, made a three wide bid on the turn and came four wide into the lane but proved to be no match to the winner, second best. NEW YORK BANKER pressed the pace on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: New York Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Tootsysrocknroller
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Miz Chaplin
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, drew clear, handily,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PICTOR was away alertly and set the pace along the inside, then dug in the final furlong and lasted late to proved best under a vigorous ride. TRENDING UP was reserved early and saved ground on the turn, closed full of run on the inside to just miss. ECLIPTICALS ELLIOT was well placed early, made a three wide bid leaving the turn and was gaining but was outfinished. MARVALOUS MIKE chased the pace four wide and rallied late but needed more. JUMPMASTER stalked the pace three wide and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Trending Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, saved ground turn, closed inside, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Eclipticals Elliot
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, bid 3 wide, gaining, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Pictor
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, dug in late, lasted, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Jumpmaster
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Marvalous Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, came 4 wide, rallied, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 83. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sinc e January 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGIC SPIN was allowed to settle early, advanced four wide on the turn and came five wide into the lane and closed well to edged clear under a drive. GANDI dueled for the lead and made a bid on the inside leaving the turn, drifted out but could not hold of the winner while saving the place award. AGGRANDIZE dueled for the lead three wide, then was between rivals by the quarter pole, angled in by the furlong marker and kept on to the wire. KEFI chased the pace five wide, made a four wide bid on the turn to vie for command by the quarter pole but flattened out. RACING IN THE RAIN was void of early speed, came six wide into the lane and had a late rally. MARATHONER chased the early pace and was on the inside by the quarter pole, faded in the drive. YO NESSROUNDONKERN failed to menace. U U STAR chased the pace four wide and weakened. MIZZEN MONEY tracked the pace on the inside and weakened. BUSTIN PIETRE chased the pace between rivals and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Racing in the Rain
ENTRY.OWNER: Chircop Steven Ross Eric and Frost Jill
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, came 6 wide, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Gandi
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, bid upper stretch, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Spin
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 5 wide, closed, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Marathoner
ENTRY.OWNER: Bing Cherry Racing Inc and Liberto Leonard
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, inside 1/4, faded stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Aggrandize
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, between 1/4, angled in, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Pietre
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: U U Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Nessroundonkern
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Kefi
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5 wide, bid 4 wide, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALL TIME CLASSIC was well rated early, made a three wide move on the turn and ranged up four wide leaving the turn, drew clear to prove best under right handed crop urging. GRATITUDE ATTITUDE was allowed to settle early, advanced four wide on the turn and came five wide into the lane and finished well to be clearly second best. MAGNETIC CHARM pressed the early pace three wide, made a two wide bid to draw clear on the turn, but weakened in the final furlong, bested rest. GERONIMO was reserved early and then offered a belated rally on the inside. YANKEE EMPIRE chased the pace on the inside and weakened. D'STORM set a pressured pace on the inside and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Yankee Empire
ENTRY.OWNER: Life Is Good Stables and Hart Sr William D
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Gratitude Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide turn, came 5 wide, late rally, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Geronimo
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, saved ground turn, belatedly inside,

ENTRY.NAME: All Time Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, 3 wide move, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: D'storm
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable and Fountain Springs Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Magnetic Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 2 wide, weakened 1/8, bested rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ON THE EDGE tracked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn, took over leaving the turn and drew clear to prove best, driving. SPEAK OF THE DEVIL was reserved early, advanced four wide on the turn, came five wide into the lane and finished well for the place award. DR GREENTHUMB tracked the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn but faded the final furlong, bested rest. RIVERBOAT BANDIT was settled back early and improved leaving the turn but lacked a serious rally. CAN'T STOP MAXEY passed the tiring rivals. WHISKIED UP was settled three wide and weakened. GREATEST WARRIOR chased the pace on the inside and weakened. NEVER TOO MUCH showed good speed on the inside to set the pace and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Never too Much
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Greatest Warrior
ENTRY.OWNER: Bates Elizabeth and Stites William P
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Speak of the Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 4 wide turn, came 5 wide, rallied, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskied Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Can't Stop Maxey
ENTRY.OWNER: A P Stable and Fox Tale Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Greenthumb
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, faded 1/8, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: On the Edge
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, drew clear, driving,
